game.shortDescription: "불렛걸즈 판타지아"는 미소녀 미스터리 액션 슈팅 "불렛걸즈" 시리즈 최신작입니다. 슬라임과 오크, 드래곤 같은 몬스터들이 득실거리는 검과 마법의 이세계에서 미소녀들이 돌격소총과 바주카를 마구 쏘아대는 통쾌한 액션을 즐기실 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Bullet Girls Phantasia" is the latest installment of the all-female third person shooter "Bullet Girls" series. This game is a thrilling action-packed game where cute girls shoot assault rifles and bazookas in a world filled with slimes, orcs, and dragons.

reviewHighlights.text: Theres a mod to make the "punishment" scenes more explicit. They know what they wanted this game to be and where they wanted to focus their attention....
The fan-service is through the roof and I am enjoying it, obviously. Mouse and keyboard controls are bad (as expected). 60 fps max (better than 30 fps...
